description: Information about the medical history of an organism.
title: medical_history

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

alcohol_history.description: Number of drinks consumed on a typical day.

medication.description: List of medications the organism was currently taking at time of biomaterial donation.

nutritional_state.description: Should be one of normal, fasting, or feeding tube removed.

smoking_history.description: Estimated number of cigarettes smoked per day and for how many years.

test_results.description: Results from any medical tests performed on the individual.

treatment.description: Any treatments the individual has undergone.
